verses.roman:
sabe kahe,-prabhu tāṅre kabhu nā milibe
āmi-saba kahi yadi, duḥkha se mānibe

synonyms: sabe kahe—everyone said; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; kabhu—at any time; nā—not; milibe—would see; āmi-saba—all of us; kahi—say; yadi—if; duḥkha—unhappiness; se—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mānibe—will feel.
translation: The devotees gave their opinion and said, "The Lord will never meet the King, and if we requested Him to do so, the Lord will surely feel very unhappy."
